definitions.definition: A type of bryophyte with a leafy stem or leafless thallus characterized by a dominant gametophyte stage and a lack of stomata on the sporophyte stage of the life cycle.
A common flowering perennial herb of northern woodlands, Hepatica nobilis (syn. Anemone hepatica ), used in traditional European herbal medicine.

main_definition: A type of bryophyte with a leafy stem or leafless thallus characterized by a dominant gametophyte stage and a lack of stomata on the sporophyte stage of the life cycle.
secondary_definitions: A common flowering perennial herb of northern woodlands, Hepatica nobilis (syn. Anemone hepatica ), used in traditional European herbal medicine.
